Prebon

Prebon got red with anger as Striker's blasters destroyed the cell 
guns and his blasters hit Ignatius in the chest as he fell to the 
ground. He got even angrier as Striker sent a message to Ramulus. 
Striker may have thought he had won all the options, but he still had 
one left he snickered.

"Striker, Striker, Striker. Do you really take me for a fool? I know 
all about what you told your computer. That camera up their isn't 
just pictures, it's sound too. Blaze told me secretly when I came 
back. So I will give you a choice now. Stand down or I will give the 
order of Spears to self destruct!"
